It's too close to call. And the judges get to decide. Is a draw out of the question? #ParkerRuiz
As the more aggressive fighter I would have it 115-113 Ruiz. #ParkerRuiz
1 round to go. Unless someone gets an 8 or a knockdown it will go to the more aggressive fighter and that looks like Ruiz to me #ParkerRuiz
It's so tight. I haven't seen a heavyweight fight in the 11th with so much leather thrown #ParkerRuiz
Big round for Parker. Two more like that and he wins the fight. More of those right hands needed #ParkerRuiz
Looked like a Ruiz round to me. 10-9 #ParkerRuiz
And it's heating up. Exciting boxing. Throwing some leather. 4-3 Ruiz but he's cut. And traditionally fades now. #ParkerRuiz
This is very good heavyweight boxing good punching. Evening out now. #ParkerRuiz
First round for Joe. Though no-one been shaken, no-one hurt. Parker has to knock out Ruiz to win this one #ParkerRuiz
Andy Ruiz a shutout after four rounds, Parker has not fought anyone of this quality #ParkerRuiz
Three rounds to Ruiz. Parker has to get much more busy #ParkerRuiz
